attributes.action: save Waltham Forest College Swimming Pool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Borough of Waltham Forest will be one of the host boroughs of the 2012 Olympics yet it sees fit to allow closure of the only 33m pool in the area. The pool is extremely valuable to the local community, numerous swimming clubs, the East London Triathletes (which boasts a world champion member), many schools use this facility to teach pupils to swim and the Boroughs very own swimming squad (who boast a British Champion as a member)The Gators train here 10 hours a week and will lose their Swim21 accreditation if this valuable pool time is lost. Help our kids realise their dreams of being in OUR Olympics.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Waltham Forest College Swimming Pool."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13053.asp

Prime Minister's Office
